original_title: Essential Food Importers Association Announces a Price Increase of Wheat Flour and Sugar
original_body_lines: The cost of basic kitchen essentials is on the rise once again as the Essential Food Importers Association has announced an increase in the price of wheat flour and sugar.
As per the latest statement released by the association, the price of a kilo of wheat flour has been raised by Rs.10, while the price of a kilo of sugar has been increased by Rs.25.
The association has not cited any specific reason for the increase in prices.
